Text: It has been a good while since bitstreeem put a flic on The Bay-  I have appreciated all of them, as my age is apparently about the same as you, and your movies hit soft spots in my youth.  I hope you are well, and that your new year is happy and healthy.
Anyone know whatever happened to Cycleof7?
This one sucks. its taken from amc so its cut. Be nice to find the uncut version.
